reviews.name: Minh Truy·ªÅn
reviews.review:
-The shop has quite spacious parking lot.
-In terms of water, it's about 8.5/10, the price is a bit high (recommend cocoa, rose lychee tea).
-Snacks are also normal, about 6.5/10
-The restaurant space is quite large, with many shooting angles. The noon sun will be quite hot. Those who are used to being in the cold are susceptible to heat stroke, so be careful to regulate your body temperature before entering the restaurant. The evening will be cool and very chill.(9/10)
-There is a changing room and you can rent photo gear and take photos comfortably at no extra charge.

reviews.name: Phi Phi Tr·∫ßn
reviews.review: It feels a bit annoying to have to ask for iced tea. The rest is Ok good. Water prices are also reasonable and suitable for photography. It's like being on a movie set.

reviews.name: pha le huynh
reviews.review: The shop is also very easy to find, in general it is very spacious and has many miniatures that are very good for taking pictures, and there are miniatures that will change according to holidays... there are sheep, goats, and rabbits that are very easy to find. For water, I order Ong Quan milk tea topping with tapioca pearls, which is very normal. In my opinion, the price is 49k. On Tet 30, there is an additional 10k surcharge, mainly because I find there are many beautiful landscapes to take pictures of. .

reviews.name: Linh Kona Life
reviews.review:
Who needs a variety of places to take photos, both outdoor and portraits?
Come to Ong Quan cafe
This place has many beautiful shooting angles and beautiful shooting angles
Reasonable water price
Linh Kona likes to take photos here. She stops by every year at the end of the year and at the beginning of the year.
This year there is an additional farm area for children to play with including sheep, rabbits, and goats.
There are also many Christmas pages.

reviews.name: Yung Yung
reviews.review:
I have a small child, I came to the shop because there are farms for goats, rabbits, etc. because there are few cf farm models near the center, the shop is the closest to me. My baby really enjoys feeding the goats, but there are too few herbs and vegetables for him to hold ^^
The first time I went, I had a good impression of the staff. There are many places to take real virtual photos.
I only drink milk coffee, so I don't know about other things. The water is really not good in my opinion, so please fix it if possible
Wishing the shop good luck selling well. Will continue to support

reviews.name: L√™ Ni
reviews.review: The shop is large and has many beautiful places to take photos and also rents ao dai clothes, but there are quite a few models.. Well, there is a tall and thin employee named Khiem who is very enthusiastic and always sees that I can't take pictures, so he takes pictures for me. It's too much for my friend ü§£ 10 points kkk

reviews.name: Hoang Nguyen
reviews.review: The shop is beautifully designed with many cool trees around. Reasonable price.

reviews.name: Xuyen Ngo
reviews.review: The shop has too many photo corners, like a movie studio, drinks are under 50k, you can take photos as you like, you can ask the staff to take photos for customers, the staff is very enthusiastic, the drinks are delicious and fresh. The shop changes its concept according to the season, so you won't get bored of going again and again!! There are many types of trees and flowers that I really like. Vote 10 points!ü´∂ü´∂ü´∂

reviews.name: Thanh Ng√¢n
reviews.review:
This is my favorite shop after spending a lot of time experiencing almost every other coffee shop in Can Tho within 3 years.
- delicious water
- beautiful view, spacious, cool
- A lot of polishing each scene to take photos for guests. Anyone who likes to take photos and relax is the right place to come here.
- The staff is cheerful, humorous, enthusiastic, thoughtful, professional and more well-trained than other coffee shops.
***** In my opinion, I always put service and delicious drinks first when choosing whether to visit next time or not, and Mr. Quan has given me a truly wonderful and complete experience.** *I regret not stopping by sooner to experience more!
Those who haven't visited Ong Quan should try it, because I'm a picky customer but I still like OQ very much, have sympathy and will visit many more times.

reviews.name: Hung La
reviews.review: The restaurant has many beautiful views, delicious drinks, and the staff are very polite, enthusiastic, and cheerful

reviews.name: Nh·ªØng Ng∆∞·ªùi Th√≠ch ƒÇn Food Lovers
reviews.review: I often go to other shops to order hot tea to drink. I've had chrysanthemum tea at many shops, but unfortunately Mr. Quan's place is the worst tea place I've ever gone to drink. There is no such thing as fragrant tea or chrysanthemum. 1, you should change the tea, 2, you should try it, it's like drinking boiled filtered water. The shop has a very large space, you can freely take photos to check in, that's all I can see.

reviews.name: Th·∫£o Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review: The water is delicious, there are many beautiful views, suitable for taking virtual photosüòç. There are a lot of places but I only took a few photos, so if you come and experience them, you will get many beautiful pictures ü•∞. The shop is extremely spacious, with many angles for taking photos.

reviews.name: Giang Binh
reviews.review:
I went during Tet, this restaurant charged both the Tet fee and the food fee. The day I went they didn't charge the Tet fee but there was still a Tet price list on the counter üòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ
The drinks seem normal, the view is ok and beautiful.
It looks like it was around Christmas time, I went many times

Note: came back in January 2025 and saw an update with quite beautiful Tet scenes

reviews.name: Anh Nguy√™n
reviews.review: The shop is very beautiful, there are many angles for taking photos, as long as the photographer has the heart to hold up their phone, they will have beautiful pictures. I went at noon and it was a bit sunny, so I couldn't take all the photos. Below are some specific photos I took. Very nice, the shop often changes the theme according to the season for customers, very flexible, in general, 10 points without any but üåüüåü

reviews.name: Vn Adam
reviews.review:
The space is so great, many beautiful views and chill vibe of Da Lat.
I went at night so I didn't see any sheep. My table is prepared with mosquito coils. 10d
Drinks are ok, not great.
You should visit everyone.
The entrance is a bit small but the entrance is super super wide. It's okay to park eight hundred cars

reviews.name: Duy Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review:
The shop has many angles for taking photos
As for drinks, it depends on each person's taste

reviews.name: FOOD SENGI
reviews.review:
The cafe has many good views in Can Tho
Drinks are also okela. There are so many virtual living corners that I'm too lazy to take pictures of, it's too wide.

üìçONG QUAN COFFEE SHOP
701 78 D. April 30, Hung Loi, Ninh Kieu, Can Tho
https://maps.app.goo.gl/yDKuhZ3fFuPe7ZdD7?g_st=com.google.maps.preview.copy

reviews.name: Cherry Lee
reviews.review:
If you don't know the way in, you'll be very confused. Go straight into the alley, run to the end of the alley, you will see two large bushes looking straight at the river, just run straight towards the river, go through the bushes and look on the right side to reach the shop.
The parking lot is perfect. At first I was a bit worried because I didn't see a parking attendant. Later, I saw a male friend sitting, but customers should lead the car themselves. The parking lot is spacious so driving is not too difficult, but if you enter a coffee shop without being asked if you can drive, points will be deducted.
Virtual living angles are nothing to discuss, almost all angles can be photographed in Da Lat style. The shop has a lot of space, I think each space creates a unique feeling. Actually, even though I'm a fan of the air-conditioned coffee system, I really like it here. The shop is well lit so you don't have to worry about not being able to take pictures at night.
There is a seat indoors, upstairs in the right corner. I think sitting there is ok for 2 or 3 people, but there is no barrier so it will be a bit dangerous and not suitable for guests afraid of heights.
The stairs upstairs are a bit steep and small, so you can go up there to play but be careful, especially if you wear tall sandals or large cross sandals like me.
I think the price for drinks is reasonable for the space and quality. The staff are lovely and have a pot of tea for you.

reviews.name: Dao Nguy·ªÖn thi
reviews.review: The first time I went to this restaurant, I saw that the restaurant was so luxurious that I was afraid that people would despise me =)) Who would have thought that the service staff would be so enthusiastic, delicious drinks, many virtual living corners, it's always great, so try it

reviews.name: Tram Quach
reviews.review:
The shop goes into a small alley at the end of 30/4 street, it's a bit difficult for cars to get in. At the end of the alley, the shop is big and spacious, designed in the style of Da Lat but in the hot sun of Can Tho.
There are sheep and goat barns that the kids also like very much. I went during the summer during the week so it was absent.
Drinking water is okay. There is a small air-conditioned area where makeup is not allowed, but the girls come in to display their normal makeup. Mainly virtual life ok. You should also try it once to see

reviews.name: Thanh Tuyen Nguyen
reviews.review: The view shop has many places to check in. The entrance road is also a bit small, once inside you can park your car freely, the shop is still doing more work. There is a cute Alaskan dog, I find the view to be strange, there are some old cardboard panels, most of the furniture is wooden. Unique design. The price is also reasonable, there is a private dressing room. There is breakfast and plenty of drinking water here

reviews.name: LamThi YTho
reviews.review: I went to the shop on September 25, 2024, a rainy afternoon. The restaurant has a lot of green space, seating is quite comfortable, and the restaurant has very cute staff. I don't know your name, but you have a beautiful smile, single eyelids, long black hair, pinkish white face and pretty lips. You look very cute wearing a moss green t-shirt. Maybe I will come often because of this employee, I wonder if she has a lover yet. But the shop plays a bit sad music (sleep). Sorry for taking a photo of you, but you're very cute, if you don't have a lover, please email me.

reviews.name: anh hoang
reviews.review: Staff are very attitude. Waited for a moment with my friend before ordering water and told me to come in and take free photos of the temple or something. That's bad

reviews.name: Tr√¢n Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review: I find the restaurant to be an ideal destination with friends and family. The shop has many styles that can take a lot of photos, creating a comfortable and close feeling. I found the water at the restaurant suitable for the price I paid, and the service staff was enthusiastic.

reviews.name: Ho√†ng H·∫£i Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review:
The shop is very chill, many photo angles are set up extremely beautifully.
Cute staff. The restaurant costs 10 VND and is free for me.

reviews.name: tien tran
reviews.review: A new location in Can Tho, if you want to take advantage of the absence of people to take photos to your liking, you should go early. There are many options for food and drinks. Because I haven't tried them yet, I can't comment. The drinks are very good, and the salt dish is an option worth trying. The outside space is spacious, the inside garden is not very spacious but the decoration is very beautiful, like being lost in another world. Close to the center for easy transportation. Reasonable price!

reviews.name: Ph√°t Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review: Delicious drinks, delicious desserts. But the menu is very expensive, from 30 to 50. Milk coffee costs 33k or something like that. So when I passed by, I saw it was very crowded in the evening. I walked to the embankment and saw it. Because I'm close to this shop's house

reviews.name: Chu Nguyen The Hoang
reviews.review:
The restaurant has a fairly diverse menu of drinks, mixed to taste but a bit sweet in some dishes. The restaurant has a breakfast menu, but it runs out quite early, so if you want to try it, you should go a little early in the morning.
The restaurant space is large, with many places to take photos or check-in. On holidays, there are beautiful decorations according to each theme. I went before the Lunar New Year and there were very beautiful decorative backdrops for Tet photos.
The shop has spacious and comfortable parking for cars and motorbikes. Enthusiastic staff, accurate dishes.
Note that if you want to be comfortable, you should go in the early morning or evening hours to be cool. During the afternoon sun, the sun is quite hot due to the nature of the outdoor restaurant.

reviews.name: Katherine
reviews.review: I see people commenting on this and that staff as bad, but in my experience, the staff here are super friendly, cute, and take good pictures. The price of drinks here is also quite better than other shops we went to. There are some beautiful employees there and the manager is also cute. In general, it's 10 VND

reviews.name: Vdesign - Website Theo Y√™u C·∫ßu
reviews.review: The shop has a great view of the garden, very beautiful with many very chill selfie angles... The drinks are delicious, but the breakfast is not very rich. Reasonable prices, quick and cheerful staff. The shop has a large space, but getting in by car will be a bit difficult.

reviews.name: Mai Nguyen
reviews.review:
The Tet atmosphere is here, let's go to the shop to check in.
The price is ok, there is a room for people to make up + change clothes, the space has many areas to take photos

reviews.name: L√™ Nh√¢n Mekong Delta
reviews.review: The restaurant has a large space and a beautiful design with a Da Lat atmosphere. The price of water is on par with the average price of the shops. The shop sells cakes and cake combos for customers to choose from conveniently. There is cold room and outdoor space. The cold room has electrical outlets near each table. Outdoors there is a garden area and terrace. The restaurant is near the river bank so the breeze is cool. The first time I entered the restaurant, I was a bit confused and afraid of getting lost

reviews.name: Lad King
reviews.review: The cafe has a very nice view for everyone to take pictures in, especially because it has a very "Da Lat" style, the flowers are very pretty and many places have very nice backgrounds. This restaurant is the best choice for everyone to experience. This is my first time visiting the restaurant and I will definitely visit next time because I like it so much.

reviews.name: V√¢n Thanh
reviews.review: Hey, to be honest, anyone planning to go should think again, the staff at the other counter has an extremely unpleasant attitude, but the drink shop is out of everything (from milk tea to crushed ice to cocoa and coffee, nothing is available) but there is still milk tea in the mixing counter, but they force me to use fruit tea, one is peach tea, the other is lipton lemon tea for 45k/cup or else I have to pay them 50k. My lover had a sore throat and couldn't drink fruit tea, so I told him to wait a bit. The staff at the counter kept pestering us with a super annoying voice (please give us another drink) and then glared at the restaurant with a very nice view, but the space to take Christmas photos was very narrow and small, it was very crowded so we couldn't take photos. There were a few staff members who were very gentle and asked permission to drink the water. After drinking it, we went back to buy some sore throat medicine, it was as sweet as sugar water and didn't have any peach scent at all. In Can Tho, there are many places with beautiful views and It's much more worthy, so please consider it to have a better experience

reviews.name: HN TOWN
reviews.review: Open space due to being close to the river, many seasonal landscapes, goat farm, generally good for a gentle Sunday morning üëç

reviews.name: To√†n Thanh
reviews.review: The restaurant is beautiful and spacious. Cool. Water costs 35k but it's delicious

reviews.name: Thuy·ªÅn Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review: Customer service is not good, I lost my item and called the staff to check the cam. The staff said yes, I texted many times but no one answered. In the case of someone losing something and asking the shop to check it but the shop doesn't check, how do you feel? Is it worth 1 star? The shop has a super superficial service attitude.

reviews.name: Hoang Loi
reviews.review:
- The space has investment, many views, but the arrangement is a bit confusing
- Acceptable water price...!
- The path is a bit difficult to find.

reviews.name: C·∫≠u Na
reviews.review: Honestly, you shouldn't go. If you go to experience the service attitude of the restaurant, just go :) the water is expensive and when ordering, it takes a while to choose, so the attitude is that when you enter the restaurant, you sit for a long time. Because I was late, I was conscious of leaving early, but the staff came in and reminded me about 10 minutes later when I came back to help the restaurant. When I got home, the staff took a photo :) It's best not to drink water, it's both expensive and not delicious.

reviews.name: B∆°
reviews.review: I've been to the restaurant many times. When it first opened and now, the beautiful view changes continuously, the water is ok, sometimes when the restaurant is crowded it's a bit overwhelming. If you want to go with a few people, then everyone goes in the morning. The rest then 10 points

reviews.name: Minh H·∫£i Tr·∫ßn
reviews.review: Unprofessional service. The staff is too harsh and has an attitude towards customers when the fault is with the restaurant's staff and equipment. The staff bluntly cursed customers when they received water late, while the water card did not signal that water was available. In general, the service attitude of the staff is extremely negative üò°üò°

reviews.name: Ng√¢n Linh
reviews.review: I paid for the drink but thought I was begging. The staff had a terrible attitude. The last time I went it was the same but I ignored it. I saw that most of the reviews were customers giving 1 star because of the staff's attitude but the shop still didn't accept it.

reviews.name: Xe c≈© c·∫ßn Th∆°
reviews.review: Spacious, many beautiful views and corners.. there are no menus for payment and remoting.. Whenever you go out, there is a remoting menu and let you know if you want to find a place to sit.

reviews.name: Le Naila
reviews.review: The restaurant is spacious with many scenes but the staff is very poor. Today we went to a restaurant to drink and take pictures. There were 7 of us, but the girl with her ponytail kept asking us to order 8 glasses of water. Of the 7 people, she ordered 8 glasses for someone to drink and was very rude to us. Go once and don't dare go again.

reviews.name: H√† Tr·∫ßn l√™ ng·ªçc
reviews.review: The staff's service attitude is very bad. On January 31, at around 4:00 p.m., our group ordered 6 glasses of water (3 cups of ice, 2 cups of milk, 1 matcha latte) and the staff gave us an order card (card number 32) to order. Whenever there was water, we went to the counter to receive water. When it rang, we went to get it, but the staff yelled at us, why don't we get water again? It's all melted. We also said that for a while we didn't see the oder card ringing, but when it rang, we took it right away, but we didn't want to take it again. Then another guy in the shop asked someone to try pressing card 32 to see if it rang. I stood there looking and didn't hear anything. And somehow that girl didn't explain or apologize to us about this problem üôÇ. Going out to relieve stress is scary.

reviews.name: V≈© Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review: Delicious water and beautiful scenery...the shop is currently decorating more so will come back next timeüòç

reviews.name: Ho√†ng Y·∫øn Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review:
Nice setup, lovely staff. You're so cute in the shop. Even playing with the baby for guests to take photos...
Thank you... ü•∞

reviews.name: Ki·ªÅu Trang
reviews.review: Delicious water, cute and enthusiastic staff. Appreciated for the staff's attitude. I asked for a salary increase for Mr. Quang and Mr. Khiem because they are so cuteü´∂üèª

reviews.name: Tr√¢n
reviews.review: The road to the shop is a bit difficult to find but easy to access for motorbikes. Cars can get all the way to the shop but the road is very narrow. Spacious parking for motorbikes and cars. Friendly staff, order drinks at the counter and accept cash payments or bank transfers. The price of water is expensive compared to the average price, but this place has small landscapes for taking pictures, so if you think about coffee and taking pictures, the price is acceptable.

reviews.name: H√¢n Gia
reviews.review: Khbiet shop takes advantage of the space, the parking lot and the outside are very large, but the branches that people take pictures of are very narrow, and some trees have untidy electrical wires that are not aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.name: —Çc–Ω‡øê Devil
reviews.review: When I go to relax, I see a woman wearing a black shirt in the water reception area. It seems like the manager has an attitude towards customers when ordering

reviews.name: Nh∆∞ √ù Tr·∫ßn
reviews.review: The shop has a beautiful space, suitable for young people or guests who like to take photos. But for families with small children, it can be inconvenient because the oder place is a bit far from the seats, the children also don't have much room to play, and when it's crowded, it gets stuck and crowded, making it difficult to keep an eye on the children. Many places where tourists take photos have traffic jams on the campus, so parents with young children may want to consider or avoid going on weekends.
